trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a collection that can contain <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供的集合，可以包含<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建类的新实例，并使用几种方法将语句添加到集合，返回其索引，并添加或移除特定索引处的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is a default empty collection constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认值为空构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> array that indicates the verbs to contain within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指示要在集合中包含的谓词的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> class using the specified array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> 对象的数组，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection at which the verb was added.
trans-unit.target: 集合中添加谓词处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> 添加到 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified set of designer verbs to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加指定的设计器谓词组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified set of designer verbs to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加指定的设计器谓词组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add an array of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> objects to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加的数组<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>对象添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of designer verbs to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的设计器谓词集合添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> objects to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>对象添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to search for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中搜索的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用以指示集合中是否存在指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中存在指定对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection.Contains%2A> method to search for the presence of a specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> object and subsequently retrieves the index value at which it was found.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection.Contains%2A>方法搜索是否存在特定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>对象，随后检索在其中找到了的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy collection members to.
trans-unit.target: 要将集合成员复制到的数组。

trans-unit.source: The destination index to begin copying to.
trans-unit.target: 开始复制的目标索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection members to the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> array beginning at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的目标索引开始，将集合成员复制到指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 数组中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to copy a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> objects to an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将复制的集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>到一个数组对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> whose index to get in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中获取索引的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified object if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象的索引（如果在列表中找到）；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to test for the presence of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> in a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何测试是否存在<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>中<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection at which to insert the verb.
trans-unit.target: 集合中要插入谓词的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to insert in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中插入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引处插入指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> into a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection> at index 0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何插入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>位于索引 0 处。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to get or set the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> 处的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> at each valid index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中每个有效索引处的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Clear" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="Clear" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Clear` event.
trans-unit.target: 继承者可以重写此方法可添加行为`Clear`事件。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert an item.
trans-unit.target: 插入项处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Insert" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="Insert" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Insert` event.
trans-unit.target: 继承者可以重写此方法可添加行为`Insert`事件。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to remove the item.
trans-unit.target: 移除项处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Remove" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="Remove" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Remove` event.
trans-unit.target: 继承者可以重写此方法可添加行为`Remove`事件。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to set the item.
trans-unit.target: 设置项处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The old object.
trans-unit.target: 旧对象。

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: 新对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Set" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="Set" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Set` event.
trans-unit.target: 继承者可以重写此方法可添加行为`Set`事件。

trans-unit.source: The object to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Validate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="Validate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Validate` event.
trans-unit.target: 继承者可以重写此方法可添加行为`Validate`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to remove a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何删除<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>从<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection>。
